Name: Night shot
About the game: 'Night Shot' is a simple, addictive game that will swallow you whole. This game can be played not only by one but also together on one computer as well as over the network. Each of the players has his own cowboy for whom you need to collect ammunition in order for him to shoot at your opponent. One game consists of five rounds in each round you get points. At the end of five rounds, the total number of points is summed up and the winner is announced. The game is beautifully designed and has many different levels. After early access rating will be added.
